title: Gumbel 2 Gumbel Beach Justice
description: Bryant Gumbel. Greg Gumbel. Brothers. Bike Cops.
quote: Purse snatching: society’s fault or one man’s cry for help?
altHero: Bryant and Greg in cop polo shirts, palm tree behind
alt1: the Gumbels on a doc next to a police motorcycle with sidecar
alt2: the Gumbels chasing down a bike thief
alt3: Bryant pushing the thief’s face in the sand
